config.rayon.title: Physics Simulation Settings
config.rayon.option.block_distance.toolt: The maximum distance (in blocks) from an entity at which blocks are loaded.
config.rayon.option.load_distance.toolti: The maximum distance (in chunks) at which rigid body entities are loaded into the physics world.
config.rayon.option.step_rate.tooltip: The rate at which the simulation is stepped.
config.rayon.option.max_sub_steps.toolti: The maximum amount of sub-steps taken during one simulation step.
config.rayon.option.debug_distance.toolt: The maximum distance (in blocks) from the player that debug outlines will be rendered.
config.rayon.option.debug_draw_mode.tool: The mode in which to draw debugging shapes to the screen
config.rayon.option.air_density.tooltip: The air density used by the air resistance simulation.
config.rayon.option.gravity.tooltip: The amount of gravity used by the physics simulation.
config.rayon.option.air_resistance_enabl: Whether or not to simulate air resistance.
